conclusion: Analyze the given waveforms and the particle's vibration image to determine direction and speed.
Waveform at t = 2 s shows displacement y of particle at x = 2 m.
Positive displacement y indicates particle is moving to the right.
Wave speed v is given by v = 位/T, where 位 is wavelength and T is period.
Wavelength 位 is distance between two consecutive peaks or troughs.
Period T is time for one complete cycle of wave to pass a given point.
Wave passes particle at x = 2 m in 2 seconds, so period T is 2 seconds.
Calculate wave speed using v = 位/T: v = 2 m / 2 s = 1 m/s.
Direction of wave propagation is to the right, wave speed is 1 m/s.
